name: Dark Forest (itch) (ctrl-alt-caleb)
description:
-- Press esc to pause and access menu & options. --

Dark Forest is  a 2D "bullet heaven" survival game... without the bullets.

Your goal is to absorb the life force of your enemies and survive as long as possible... good luck and thanks for playing!

Created in 3 Days for the #scorejam #20 "absorb" theme

I am planning to use this game as an extremely early demo and expand it later with more systems and features. i.e. level-system, more enemies, & items

-caleb 

(⌐■_■)

Programming: caleb
